snippet: The experience of Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker and mayoral candidate, illustrates why bulimia cannot be summed up simply as dieting taken to an extreme.
abstract: The experience of Christine C. Quinn, the City Council speaker and mayoral candidate, illustrates why bulimia cannot be summed up simply as dieting taken to an extreme.

headline.main: A Politician's Disclosure Offers a Lesson in Eating Disorders
headline.print_headline: Sharing a Battle Against an Eating Disorder
